profile.name: Ismael Raya Fabián
profile.subtitle: Python • SQL • Power BI • Machine Learning

description.paragraph1: After several years as a professional chef in Germany and Spain, I decided to redirect my career towards *programming and data analysis*. My culinary experience taught me to work under pressure, maintain *organization and precision in demanding environments*, and *collaborate effectively in teams*.
description.paragraph2: With education in *Business Administration & Finance* and *Multiplatform Application Development*, I combine knowledge in *financial analysis* with experience in *Java*, *C#*, and *databases*. I am currently deepening this knowledge by pursuing a master's degree in *Data Science & AI*. I develop projects with *Python*, *SQL*, *Machine Learning* and *Power BI*. I am passionate about discovering patterns in data and solving complex problems.
description.paragraph3: My solid foundation in *programming and financial analysis*, combined with practical software development experience, allows me to contribute an integral perspective that combines *technical skills* and *business insight* to grow as a *Data Scientist and Data Analyst*.

jobs.title: Data Science Student
jobs.description: Intensive training in data analysis, statistics, *Python*, *SQL*, *Power BI* and *machine learning*. Development of practical projects applying predictive models and data visualization.

jobs.title: Programming Internship
jobs.description: Simulator development with *Unity*. Collaborative work using *GitHub* and *Scrum* methodology. *Database* design and maintenance. Experience in software development and project management.

jobs.title: Chef
jobs.company: Hotels and restaurants - Stuttgart and Seville
jobs.description: Working under *pressure* and *time management*. *Quality standards compliance*. *Team leadership experience* and *coordination*.

items.title: Higher Level Training Cycle in Multiplatform Application Development
items.description: Complete training in *multiplatform software development*. Programming in *Java*, *C#*, *databases*, *web development* and *mobile applications*. Agile methodologies and *project management*.

items.title: German Dual Training in Culinary Arts
items.description: *International training* in German dual system. Development of skills in *organization*, *international quality standards* and *multicultural work*. Experience in high-level business environment.

items.title: Higher Level Training Cycle in Business Administration and Finance
items.description: Training in *financial analysis*, *business management* and *data processing*. Solid foundation in *advanced Excel*, *analytical accounting* and *financial reporting*.

items.title: Intermediate Level Training Cycle in Business Management and Administration
items.description: Fundamentals of *business management*, *customer service* and *administrative processes*. First approach to *data analysis* and *information systems*.

items.title: Intelligent Sports Progression System
items.description: Application with *data architecture* designed for predictive analysis of sports adherence. Includes *recommendation engine* for automatic routine progression and exercise *knowledge graph*.

items.title: Professional Vue.js Portfolio
items.description: Responsive portfolio with *i18n system*, *glassmorphism design* and dynamic navigation. Complete development with *Vue 3*, *Vite* and modular component architecture.
